content.text: 支付餐厅，在app点击book now会跳转到widget
A new bug has been reported by jason.law@company.co . Here are the details.
Email address jason.law@company.co
Urgent? URGENT!
Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2C [BOOK] companyWeb / Widget
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Book Now button in app leads to
booking widget instead of booking in app
More Details of your problem? When booking in some restaurants in app,
after clicking the Book Now button, it will direct the diner to a booking
widget instead booking in the app as usual.
Current Result (what is currently happening) Book Now button leads to
booking widget
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) Able to book in app as usual
Who is affected? ALL users
When did this first happen? At the time of this report
Can you reproduce the problem? All the time
Restaurant Details (Name/RestaurantUID) Jamie's Italian (Tsim Sha Tsui) /
jamiesitaliantsimshatsui50dfl76r2
Jamie's Italian (Causeway Bay) / jamiesitaliancausewaybay54kas44a-4

nonEditableReason.message: To set an epic as the parent, use the epic link instead

content.text: A new bug has been reported by ayu@company.co . Here are the details.
Email address ayu@company.co
Urgent? Quite Urgent
Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2C [BOOK] companyWeb / Widget
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Cannot make rez, keeps triggering to
mark checkbox
More Details of your problem? Three Buns Quayside
(threebunsquayside1808tbq) has a dropdown select for Indoor/Outdoor. When
you select Indoor, it will trigger a compulsory checkbox and Outdoor will
not trigger. But when selecting Indoor, it will ask to select compulsory
checkbox even though there is none. Refer to screen record attached. I have
since removed the compulsory checkbox triggered for selecting Indoors as it
is affecting diners from making reservations.
Current Result (what is currently happening) Not being able to make rez
when selecting outdoors
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) Should be able to make rez when
selecting outdoors
Steps to reproduce issue I have removed it as it prevents diners from
making reservations in real time
Who is affected? ALL users
Have a screenshot / video of the problem? File 1
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1IGlgekh9HGGxKFNa7E_xpE4TBaEyAKue

A new bug has been reported by hiro@company.co . Here are the details.
Email address hiro@company.co
Urgent? Quite Urgent
Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2B companyBook / MR4 iPad / Queues app / Telephony
Brief Description (One Line Summary) The table assigned to a guest is
different from the overview (list) vs what's on the reservation details.
More Details of your problem? Please see attached screenshot and video. The
booking ID: 4FOKH at UNION PIK AVENUE
Current Result (what is currently happening) As attached. When you see the
reservation under the upcoming bookings, it is assigned to Table X. But
when you tap on the reservation to see the booking details, the tables
assigned to this booking is Table Y. This has happened a few times before -
we first noticed it at Sarong Group, where bookings were assigned to tables
that didn't even exist (and this was different from when you see it under
upcoming bookings vs when you tap on the booking to see the details).
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) The tables should be the same
whether you are looking at the booking list, or drilling down to look at
the booking details.
Steps to reproduce issue See video attached
Who is affected? ALL users
When did this first happen? At the time of this report
Can you reproduce the problem? Most of the time
Have a screenshot / video of the problem? File 1
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1fTmj0ToZAiZUNqwuHsVHJhe049CJaMtu
File 2 <
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1qWkQnAjOntJ2PitkNx-TOX3YCjVzw5rA
Login Details (Username/Password) Use the Union Support login details we
gave to tech
Restaurant Details (Name/RestaurantUID) Union PIK Avenue / unionpik1707jkt
App Version Latest app
Device OS and Device Type iPad 2017

Which Product Line? B2C [BOOK] companyWeb / Widget

continue after diner keys in the OTP.
More Details of your problem? Two diners have reported that there is no
button for them to submit the OTP and continue making a reservation for
restaurants that require OTP verification. Both mentioned that they were on
their laptops, and one of them tried on both internet explorer and google
chrome browsers and both did not have the button for them to submit the OTP
to make the reservation.
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) There should be a button for
the diner to click to submit the OTP and continue making the reservation.
Steps to reproduce issue As I have already verified my own mobile number, I
am unable to reproduce this.

content.text: A new bug has been reported by felicia@company.co . Here are the details.
Email address felicia@company.co
Urgent? Quite Urgent
Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2C [SAVE] companyApp / Shopify / Promo Code / Redemption
Portal
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Partially fulfilled Orders do not
appear in Summary data if extracted on the day itself
More Details of your problem? Wild Honey Mandarin Gallery has written to us
that they were unable to locate voucher redemption information for 4 orders
on the fulfillment day itself.
For eg (Voucher 626218106933 and 638263361589 did not reflect after summary
data is extracted from Voucher Redemption Portal on 19th Oct. These 2
vouchers belong to partially fulfilled orders. However, we are able to see
the data right now after the daily sync at 12am.
Current Result (what is currently happening) Partially fulfilled Orders do
not appear in Summary data if extracted on the day itself, until the next
day.
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) All fulfilled voucher
information should reflect in the summary data immediately.
Who is affected? Only one or some users
When did this first happen? Oct 19, Oct 20
Restaurant Details (Name/RestaurantUID) Wild Honey at Mandarin Gallery
(Vendor Code- 0310whm Restaurant RID- wildhoneymg35dfs95r2)

www.company.co
Begin forwarded message:
> From: "company Reservations" <rez@company.co>

> To: arrifz@yahoo.com

> Name	Mr. Arrif Ziaudeen

> # of Covers	4
> Confirmation ID	4DUWK
> Edit/Cancel	Click here to EDIT/CANCEL your reservation
> Address	25 Dempsey Road
> Singapore (249670)	Map
> Telephone	6266 3822
> Notes	September+Dinner Menu
> Morsels

> Cosy, a wee bit quaint, and wholeheartedly welcoming, Morsels at Dempsey refuses to be confined to a single cuisine. The plates - crafted by stupendous chef Petrina Loh - offers a diverse range of food that draws on a myriad of flavours, ingredients, and techniques. The result is an informal and int ...More
> Email	reservations@morsels.com.sg
> Do note that tables will only be held for 15 mins.

> Bon appetit,
> The company Team

Email address kunal@company.co
Urgent? Quite Urgent
Severity? Not say very severe
Which Product Line? B2C [BOOK] companyApp / Loyalty
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Booking still shown as 'upcoming
reservation' after canceling
Current Result (what is currently happening) After I canceled my booking,
it's still on my 'upcoming reservations' on the app home screen. I can even
click on it and try to cancel again (as per screenshot) even though it's
already been canceled. It should not be there as it has already been
canceled.
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) It should disappear from
'upcoming reservations' on the home screen.
Steps to reproduce issue Make a booking on the app, cancel it on the app
and see if the booking still shows up on 'upcoming reservations' on app
home screen.
Who is affected? Don't Know...
When did this first happen? At the time of this report
Can you reproduce the problem? All the time
Have a screenshot / video of the problem? File 1
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1NtQ_tvq70QOhB6Z2PNZ2zTqPAfXl0GHr
File 2 <
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1xI9nPVbdhkG6zZ91tq-usaU8WU4Et1Mh
File 3 <
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1bUrN7QUJFsLsItD8NEBrZI_Xd6dzKKbq
File 4 <
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1YFrAnqsH7fb8I-AaDaZZX4b6_gBAeyE3

content.text: A new bug has been reported by xiaochen.zhang@company.co . Here are the
details.

Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2C [SAVE] companyApp / Shopify / Promo Code / Redemption
Portal
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Unable to apply discount code multiple
times
More Details of your problem? Customer tried to apply discount code on 3
different occasions. All were not successful. Latest discount code she was
using - VBVDPWE9XR8A, indicated 'used' on shopify, but was not found
applied on any vouchers she bought.
Current Result (what is currently happening) We have sent customer new
discount code and requested her to try applying it on Web instead of app.
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) Shopify to show which voucher
she applied discount code VBVDPWE9XR8A on. And customer to be able to apply
her discount code on both app and web.

content.text: A new bug has been reported by shermin@company.co . Here are the details.
Email address shermin@company.co
Urgent? Quite Urgent
Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2B companyCloud / MR Web
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Cannot see waitlists on companycloud
More Details of your problem? When I login using the opscompanybook account
on companyCloud, I am unable to view waitlists as seen in the video. There is
no 'waiting tab', though I can see that there's one waitlisted rez under
'waitlisted'.
Besides this, are we able to view queues on companyCloud? I am able to add a
queue on companyBook, but we cannot see Queues on companyCloud.
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) I should be able to see a
'waiting' tab to view waitlisted rez.

Can you reproduce the problem? All the time

content.text: A new bug has been reported by teren@company.co . Here are the details.
Email address teren@company.co
Urgent? Not say very urgent
Severity? Not say very severe
Which Product Line? B2C [BOOK] companyWeb / Widget
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Edit/Cancel link in confirmation email
becomes invalid when restaurant changes phone number of the reservation
More Details of your problem?
http://bookv5.company.co/booking/show?rid=fatcow1706ftc&rz_id=4D8YN&cell=83533814&source=rest_www.fat-cow.com.sg
This is the link given to the diner in her confirmation email, but the
error message (
https://i.imgur.com/doORYOH.jpg)
displays because the
restaurant changed the phone number after the reservation was made.
I understand it's not possible to update the confirmation email once it's
sent - would it be possible to change the error message in some way to be
more accurate? E.g. "this reservation is tied to a different phone number"
or for more privacy, "this reservation/phone number combination does not
exist".
Who is affected? ALL users
Can you reproduce the problem? All the time
